View

Class MapTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • View.MapTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class MapTile
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    This class represents a single tile on the tile map as a JLabel.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • hoverTile

        public void hoverTile(boolean hover)
        This method colors this tile red if the mouse hovers over it and recolors the last hovered tile back to transparent.
        Parameters:
        hover - a boolean variable that is true if the mouse hovered over the tile and false if not.

      • setHovered

        public void setHovered(boolean hovered)
        This method sets this tile to hovered or not.
        Parameters:
        hovered - a boolean varibale that is true if mouse hovered over the tile and false if not.

      • getHovered

        public boolean getHovered()
        Returns:
        Returns the hover status of this tile, true if mouse is on it or false if not.
